meanings.definition: The quality of being playful or humorous.
meanings.sent1: Her jocoseness brightened the room with laughter.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's jocoseness entertained the audience.
meanings.sent3: His jocoseness made even the grumpiest person smile.
meanings.sent4: The jocoseness in her tone was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The jocoseness of the situation was contagious, spreading joy to all.

meanings.definition: A playful or humorous quality in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: The writer's jocoseness added charm to the story.
meanings.sent2: His jocoseness in conversation always lightened the mood.
meanings.sent3: The jocoseness of the joke had everyone laughing out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her jocoseness flowed through her words like a gentle stream.
meanings.sent5: The jocoseness of his writing painted vivid pictures in the reader's mind.
